class.name: gd_Vrml_MaterialBindingAndNormalBinding
class.brief_description: Godot GDExtension wrapper for the Open CASCADE Vrml_MaterialBindingAndNormalBinding enum.
class.description: This class exposes the Vrml_MaterialBindingAndNormalBinding enum from Open CASCADE to Godot scripts. It is a dummy wrapper and does not provide any methods or properties other than the enum constants. Use this class to access material and normal binding modes for VRML objects in Open CASCADE via Godot.

constant.name: DEFAULT
constant.description: Default binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_DEFAULT in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: OVERALL
constant.description: Overall binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_OVERALL in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_PART
constant.description: Per-part binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_PART in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_PART_INDEXED
constant.description: Per-part indexed binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_PART_INDEXED in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_FACE
constant.description: Per-face binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_FACE in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_FACE_INDEXED
constant.description: Per-face indexed binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_FACE_INDEXED in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_VERTEX
constant.description: Per-vertex binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_VERTEX in Open CASCADE.

constant.name: PER_VERTEX_INDEXED
constant.description: Per-vertex indexed binding mode. Equivalent to Vrml_PER_VERTEX_INDEXED in Open CASCADE.
